```{r}
library(lubridate)
dtObject<-ymd_hms("1970-01-01 00:02:53") 
dtObjectVector<-ymd_hms(
  c("1970-01-01 00:02:53",
    "1980-02-11 11:25:22")
)
```

```{r}
Sys.timezone()
twDateTime <- ymd_hms("2019-03-18 14:04:00", tz="Asia/Taipei")
LisbonDateTime <- with_tz(twDateTime,tzone="Europe/Lisbon")
```
